Description: Rectangular limestone with a cornice at the top below which are four registers: 1 - Four rows of Hieroglyphic text. 2 - Two mirror-image scenes of seated figures with an attendant. 3 + 4 - Four kneeling figures.
Bibliographic references: Scott-Moncrieff 1912 / Hieroglyphic texts from Egyptian stelae, etc., in the British Museum, Part 2. (pl.47)
